Script.Query: CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_tools` ( `toolID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tooltip` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `icon` blob NOT NULL, `configTemplate` mediumtext NOT NULL, `toolType` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `openEmapVersion` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `sortIndex` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `alias` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`toolID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=13 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_printservice_scales` ( `scaleID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `printServiceID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `scale` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`scaleID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_printservice_scales_1` (`printServiceID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_printservice_scales_1` FOREIGN KEY (`printServiceID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_printservices` (`printServiceID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_printservice_resolutions` ( `resolutionID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `printServiceID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `resolution` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`resolutionID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_printservice_resolutions_1` (`printServiceID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_printservice_resolutions_1` FOREIGN KEY (`printServiceID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_printservices` (`printServiceID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_printservice_outputformats` ( `outputFormatID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `printServiceID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `format` varchar(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`outputFormatID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_printservice_outputformats_1` (`printServiceID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_printservice_outputformats_1` FOREIGN KEY (`printServiceID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_printservices` (`printServiceID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_printservice_layouts` ( `layoutID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `printServiceID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`layoutID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_printservice_layouts_1` (`printServiceID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_printservice_layouts_1` FOREIGN KEY (`printServiceID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_printservices` (`printServiceID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_printconfiguration_prints` ( `mapPrintID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `printConfigurationID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `printServiceID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `resolutionID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `scaleID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `layoutID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `outputFormatID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `alias` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mapPrintID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_printconfiguration_prints_1` (`printConfigurationID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_printconfiguration_prints_2` (`printServiceID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_printconfiguration_prints_1` FOREIGN KEY (`printConfigurationID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_printconfigurations` (`printConfigurationID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_printconfiguration_prints_2` FOREIGN KEY (`printServiceID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_printservices` (`printServiceID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_mapconfigurations` ( `mapConfigurationID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `mapConfigTemplate` mediumtext NOT NULL, `openEmapVersion` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `enabled` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mapConfigurationID`), UNIQUE KEY `Index_2` (`name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_mapconfiguration_tools` ( `mapConfigurationID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `toolID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mapConfigurationID`,`toolID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_mapconfiguration_tools_2` (`toolID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_mapconfiguration_tools_1` FOREIGN KEY (`mapConfigurationID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_mapconfigurations` (`mapConfigurationID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_mapconfiguration_tools_2` FOREIGN KEY (`toolID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_tools` (`toolID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_searchlmservices` ( `searchLMServiceID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `searchLMAddress` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `lmUser` varchar(16) NOT NULL, `searchPrefix` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL, `municipalityCode` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL, `pudSearchEnabled` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `addressSearchEnabled` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `placeSearchEnabled` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `coordinateSearchEnabled` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`searchLMServiceID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_queries` ( `queryID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `description` text, `helpText` text, `startInstruction` text, `requiredQueryMessage` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `minimalDrawingScale` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `incorrectDrawingMessage` text, `allowOnlyOneGeometry` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `pudSearchEnabled` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `addressSearchEnabled` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `placeSearchEnabled` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `coordinateSearchEnabled` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `mapConfigurationID` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`queryID`), KEY `FK_general_map_queries_1` (`mapConfigurationID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_queries_1` FOREIGN KEY (`mapConfigurationID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_mapconfigurations` (`mapConfigurationID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_querytools` ( `queryToolID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `queryID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `toolID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `tooltip` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `onlyOneGeometry` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`queryToolID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_querytools_1` (`queryID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_querytools_2` (`toolID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_querytools_1` FOREIGN KEY (`queryID`) REFERENCES `general_map_queries` (`queryID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_querytools_2` FOREIGN KEY (`toolID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_tools` (`toolID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=48 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_queryprints` ( `queryPrintID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `queryID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `mapPrintID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `scale` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `useInPreview` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`queryPrintID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_queryprints_1` (`queryID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_queryprints_2` (`mapPrintID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_queryprints_1` FOREIGN KEY (`queryID`) REFERENCES `general_map_queries` (`queryID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_queryprints_2` FOREIGN KEY (`mapPrintID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_printconfiguration_prints` (`mapPrintID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=17 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_instances` ( `queryInstanceID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `queryID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `extent` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `epsg` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `visibleBaseLayer` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`queryInstanceID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_instances_1` (`queryID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_instances_1` FOREIGN KEY (`queryID`) REFERENCES `general_map_queries` (`queryID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_instance_geometries` ( `geometryID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `queryInstanceID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `config` text NOT NULL, `geometry` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`geometryID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_instance_geometries_1` (`queryInstanceID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_instance_geometries_1` FOREIGN KEY (`queryInstanceID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_instances` (`queryInstanceID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `general_map_query_instance_prints` ( `queryPrintID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `queryInstanceID` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `layout` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `format` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `scale` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `resolution` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `useInPreview` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `mapImage` mediumblob NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`queryPrintID`), KEY `FK_general_map_query_instance_prints_1` (`queryInstanceID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_general_map_query_instance_prints_1` FOREIGN KEY (`queryInstanceID`) REFERENCES `general_map_query_instances` (`queryInstanceID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
ALTER TABLE `general_map_query_instance_geometries` MODIFY COLUMN `config` TEXT CHARACTER SET latin1 COLLATE latin1_swedish_ci DEFAULT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `general_map_query_instances` MODIFY COLUMN `visibleBaseLayer` VARCHAR(4096) CHARACTER SET latin1 COLLATE latin1_swedish_ci DEFAULT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `general_map_queries` ADD COLUMN `forceQueryPopulation` TINYINT UNSIGNED AFTER `mapConfigurationID`;
ALTER TABLE `general_map_query_queryprints` MODIFY COLUMN `scale` INT(10) UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL;
UPDATE general_map_query_printconfigurations SET printConfigTemplate = REPLACE(printConfigTemplate, "center: $center,", "$center,") WHERE printConfigTemplate LIKE "%center: $center,%";
UPDATE general_map_query_printconfigurations SET printConfigTemplate = REPLACE(printConfigTemplate, "scale: $scale,", "$scale, $bbox,") WHERE printConfigTemplate LIKE "%scale: $scale,%";
UPDATE general_map_query_printconfigurations SET printConfigTemplate = REPLACE(printConfigTemplate, "\"center\": $center,", "$center,") WHERE printConfigTemplate LIKE "%\"center\": $center,%";
UPDATE general_map_query_printconfigurations SET printConfigTemplate = REPLACE(printConfigTemplate, "\"scale\": $scale,", "$scale, $bbox,") WHERE printConfigTemplate LIKE "%\"scale\": $scale,%";
ALTER TABLE `general_map_query_instance_prints` MODIFY COLUMN `scale` INT(10) UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL;
